episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_010:
Rosa! I hereby appoint you to be the tourism
ambassador of Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_020:
And I want you to support
her, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_040:
Both you and [Name:PlayerNickname ] are
well known on Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_050:
Since you both know how amazing Pasio is, you’ll
be able to guide the sightseers that come here
from other places.
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_060: Plus, I know you two will make it exciting!
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_070:
If you can be a successful tourism ambassador
and make Pasio more popular than it already is...
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_080:
we may get to meet rare Pokémon and battle
strong Trainers from all over the world, right?
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_100:
Master Lear’s getting suuuper good at giving
compliments, huh.
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_110:
The young master has the future of Pasio in mind.
He’s constantly growing as a person!
episode_event_specialcos03/4001_1001_130: Sure! I’d love to do it!
episode_event_specialcos03/4002_1001_020: I’m gonna collect a lot of Travel Exp.!
episode_event_specialcos03/6801_1031_010:
I’m so excited to
experience everything
here on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos03/6801_1001_010:
Since I’m here, I made a list of the things I
wanna do!
episode_event_specialcos03/6801_1001_020:
The sights! The food! The people! The activities!
There’s so much to do, I can’t decide where
to begin!
episode_event_specialcos03/6801_1001_030: Pasio has so many wonderful places!
episode_event_specialcos03/6801_1001_040:
I’ll show you around so you can enjoy every part
of it!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_030: Thanks! I appreciate the help, you two.
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_040:
We all brainstormed together, so I know it’s a
great tour plan.
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_050:
I got the ideas from the island challenge in the
Alola region!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_060:
Completing trials will be way more memorable
than just walking around and sightseeing!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_070: You’re going to make the sightseers take on trials?
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_080: Yes, but it won’t be dangerous.
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_090:
Besides, Rosa and [Name:PlayerNickname ] are
gonna be with them, so it should be OK!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_100:
That must be the meeting spot. Are you
the ambassador?
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_130: Hehehe! Are you gonna show me around?
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_140: Pasio is an artificial island that’s full of nature!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_150: We’ll look around many famous spots, so...
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_160:
be sure to use all your senses to take in the
beauty of nature! Enjoy it as much as you can!
episode_event_specialcos03/4003_1001_180:
I don’t think we need to worry, but let’s watch
over them just in case...
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_010:
This must be Pasio’s beach. It’s glistening!
Hang on—I’ve gotta take a selfie of this to
post later!
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_020: We’ve been waiting for you, Pasio trial-goer!
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_040:
At every tourist attraction on Pasio, you’ll
encounter a trial like this!
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_050: Let’s work together and face the challenge!
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_0401_080: A team battle? Like a three-on-three match?
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_120: That’s sooo Pasio! I just have to give it a try!
episode_event_specialcos03/4004_1001_130: Now then, let’s start our first trial!
episode_event_specialcos03/4005_1001_010: Isn’t this where we’re supposed to meet?
episode_event_specialcos03/4005_1001_030: Don’t worry! I’ll take you to where everyone is!
episode_event_specialcos03/4005_1001_040: Oh! I know who you are!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_010: Next, I’ll show you the mountains here on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_020: They’re finally headed to the last spot!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_030:
All those battles were pretty tough, but I’m having
so much fun!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_040:
But I was wondering... How come we’re battling
so much?
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_050:
The more you battle with your Pokémon,
the stronger you become as a sync pair!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_060:
My friends came up with the idea, but instead of
just walking around touristy places...
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_070:
they said it would be much more memorable to
complete trials together!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_080:
Pokémon battles on Pasio are a great experience
that both Trainers and their Pokémon will
remember!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_100:
Yeah! The guests look happy, and Rosa’s tour was
a huge success!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_110: I made the right decision to leave it to them.
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_120:
Yup yup! If we keep doing Pokémon battles, the
other Trainers that come here to sight-see might...
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_160:
I think there was someone else besides me who
was supposed to come today. We haven’t seen
them, right?
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_180:
What are they talking about? I haven’t heard
anything about that.
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_190:
That’s strange... I didn’t think there were any
other guests...
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_240:
I was watching the both of you while you were
doing the tour...
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_250: Never mind that! We’re in big trouble!
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_260:
You see, the other tourist who came to sight-see
was supposed to be brought to the meeting
spot, but...
episode_event_specialcos03/4006_1001_270:
due to some mix-up, Leon’s the one showing
them around!
episode_event_specialcos03/4007_1001_020:
Oh? It seems like we’ve ended up in the wrong
place again.
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_010: Oh no! What should we do?
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_020: Whoa! Lear! Elio! You’re here too?
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_030: Did I hear you say that Leon is guiding the tourist?!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_050:
He has no sense of direction whatsoever. How will
we even find them?!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_060:
Y’know, it might be fun since he could take them
to all kinds of places.
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_080: Hey, are you guys referring to the Champion Leon?
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_090:
If so, people have been posting his whereabouts
on social media...
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_110: So, was there any useful information?
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_130:
With this information, we can probably figure out
where they’re heading next!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_140: I know everything about Pasio, so leave it to me!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_150:
I know where everything is—and which spots
are everyone’s favorites!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_160:
Now’s the time to show my powers as a super
tourism ambassador!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_180:
I’ll leave that to you! I’ll also order my staff to
search for them.
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_210:
We’re counting on you, super
tourism ambassador!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_220:
Leon’s famous! When I meet him, I should ask for
his autograph and brag about it on my socials!
episode_event_specialcos03/4008_1001_230:
This is the Pasio experience! I’ll get tons of Travel
Exp. from this!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_040: Wow! I can’t believe we actually found them!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_050: I’m terribly sorry for causing trouble.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_060: I was supposed to take you to the meeting spot.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_070: But instead, I dragged you around.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_080: N-no! I’m not bothered at all!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_100:
We were able to see a lot of famous places
on Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_110:
It was such a rewarding experience to travel
around the island with you!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_130:
Isn’t that great, Rosa? The guest wasn’t upset
at all!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_140:
We may have run into a few hiccups, but we’re
all settled now!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_150: Yes! All thanks to everyone’s help!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_160: I’m relieved. My first tour didn’t end in failure.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_170: It turned out all right in the end, I suppose.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_180:
Wait, this was your first time? You did such a
good job!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_190: This is something Lear said, but...
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_200: If Pasio becomes more famous than it is now...
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_210:
then we’ll be able to see a lot more Pokémon and
strong Trainers. That’s why Rosa is trying her best.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_230:
I actually accepted the role as a tourism
ambassador for Shaymin’s sake.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_240:
Feelings of gratitude are Shaymin’s source
of energy.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_250:
Professor Oak told me that when you’re feeling
grateful, you should share it with others!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_260:
That’s why I wanted to show Shaymin the
gratitude I get from everyone who visits Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_280:
Not only were you treating us sightseers
with care...
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_290:
But you were also caring for your partner
Pokémon, too!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_300: This is how a sync pair should be on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_310:
Thank you for taking us around so many wonderful
places today!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_330: I had fun too! Thank you!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_340:
I’d like to thank you too, for giving me your best
smiles and appreciating what I do!
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_350: I fell in love with Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos03/4009_1001_360:
I wanna keep on battling so I can meet even
more sync pairs!
